00030 function marcXMLsenayan($str_marcxml, $str_xml_type = 'string')
00031 {
00032     // MARC XML file path
00033     $_records = array();
00034 
00035     // load XML
00036     if ($str_xml_type == 'file') {
00037         // load from file
00038         if (file_exists($str_marcxml)) {
00039             $xml = simplexml_load_file($str_marcxml);
00040         } else {
00041             return 'File '.$str_marcxml.' not found! Please supply full path to MARC XML file';
00042         }
00043     } else {
00044         // load from string
00045         try {
00046             $xml = new SimpleXMLElement($str_marcxml);
00047         } catch (Exception $xmlerr) {
00048             die($xmlerr->getMessage());
00049         }
00050     }
00051 
00052 
00053     $record_num = 0;
00054     $corp_authors = array();
00055     $conf_authors = array();
00056     // start iterate records
00057     foreach ($xml->record as $record) {
00058         // default elements
00059         $isbn_issn = '';
00060         $classification = '';
00061         $language = '';
00062         $main_author = '';
00063         $title = '';
00064         $title_main = '';
00065         $title_sub = '';
00066         $title_statement_resp = '';
00067         $gmd = '';
00068         $edition = '';
00069         $publish_place = '';
00070         $publisher = '';
00071         $publish_year = '';
00072         $physical = '';
00073         $series = '';
00074         $notes = '';
00075         $topics = array();
00076         $authors = array();
00077         $copies = array();
00078         $call_number = '';
00079         $collection_type = '';
00080         $corp_authors[$record_num] = '';
00081         $conf_authors[$record_num] = '';
00082         // field
00083         foreach ($record->datafield as $field) {
00084             // subfield
00085             foreach ($field->subfield as $subfield) {
00086                 // author
00087                 if ((string)$field['tag'] == '020' OR (string)$field['tag'] == '022') {
00088                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00089                         $isbn_issn = $subfield;
00090                     }
00091                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '041') {
00092                     // language
00093                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00094                         $language = $subfield;
00095                     }
00096                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '082') {
00097                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00098                         // DDC classification
00099                         $classification = $subfield;
00100                     }
00101                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '100') {
00102                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00103                         $main_author = (string)$subfield;
00104                     }
00105                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '245') {
00106                     // title
00107                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00108                         $title_main = $subfield;
00109                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'b') {
00110                         $title_sub = $subfield;
00111                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'c') {
00112                         $title_statement_resp = $subfield;
00113                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'h') {
00114                         $gmd = $subfield;
00115                     }
00116                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '250') {
00117                     // edition
00118                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00119                         $edition = $subfield;
00120                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'b') {
00121                         $edition .= ' '.$subfield;
00122                     }
00123                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '260') {
00124                     // imprint
00125                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00126                         $publish_place = $subfield;
00127                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'b') {
00128                         $publisher = $subfield;
00129                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'c') {
00130                         $publish_year = $subfield;
00131                     }
00132                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '300') {
00133                     // physical
00134                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00135                         $physical = $subfield;
00136                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'b') {
00137                         $physical .= ' - '.$subfield;
00138                     }
00139                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '440') {
00140                     // series
00141                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00142                         $series = $subfield;
00143                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'v') {
00144                         $series .= ' '.$subfield;
00145                     }
00146                 } else if (preg_match('@^5.+@i', (string)$field['tag'])) {
00147                     // notes
00148                     $notes .= $subfield.'; ';
00149                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '600') {
00150                     // authors subject headings
00151                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00152                         $authors[] = (string)$subfield;
00153                     }
00154                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '610') {
00155                     // authors corporate subject heading
00156                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00157                         $corp_author_buff .= (string)$subfield;
00158                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'b') {
00159                         $corp_author_buff .= (string)$subfield;
00160                     }
00161                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '611') {
00162                     // authors conference/meeting subject heading
00163                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00164                         $conf_author_buff .= (string)$subfield;
00165                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'c') {
00166                         $conf_author_buff .= '.'.(string)$subfield;
00167                     }
00168                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '650') {
00169                     // topics
00170                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00171                         $topics[] = (string)$subfield;
00172                     }
00173                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '700') {
00174                     // additional authors
00175                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00176                         $authors[] = (string)$subfield;
00177                     }
00178                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '710') {
00179                     // additional authors corporate
00180                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00181                         $corp_authors[$record_num] .= (string)$subfield;
00182                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'b') {
00183                         $corp_authors[$record_num] .= (string)$subfield;
00184                     }
00185                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '711') {
00186                     // additional authors conference/meeting
00187                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'a') {
00188                         $conf_authors[$record_num] .= (string)$subfield;
00189                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'c') {
00190                         $conf_authors[$record_num] .= '.'.(string)$subfield;
00191                     }
00192                 } else if ((string)$field['tag'] == '852') {
00193                     // copies
00194                     if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'p') {
00195                         $copies[] = (string)$subfield;
00196                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'h') {
00197                         $call_number = $subfield;
00198                     } else if ((string)$subfield['code'] == 'c') {
00199                         $collection_type = $subfield;
00200                     }
00201                 }
00202             }
00203             // concat titles
00204             $title = (string)$title_main.( $title_sub?(string)$title_sub:'' ).( $title_statement_resp?(string)$title_statement_resp:'' );
00205         }
00206 
00207         // reset $data array
00208         $data = array();
00209         // clear array
00210         if (!$corp_authors[$record_num]) { unset($corp_authors[$record_num]); }
00211         if (!$conf_authors[$record_num]) { unset($conf_authors[$record_num]); }
00212 
00213         $data['title'] = (string)$title;
00214         $data['gmd'] = (string)$gmd;
00215         $data['gmd'] = str_replace(array('[', ']'), '', trim($data['gmd']));
00216         $data['edition'] = (string)$edition;
00217         $data['isbn_issn'] = (string)$isbn_issn;
00218         $data['publisher'] = (string)$publisher;
00219         $data['publish_year'] = (integer)$publish_year;
00220         $data['collation'] = (string)$physical;
00221         $data['series_title'] = (string)$series;
00222         $data['call_number'] = (string)$call_number;
00223         $data['language'] = (string)$language;
00224         $data['publish_place'] = (string)$publish_place;
00225         $data['classification'] = (string)$classification;
00226         $data['notes'] = (string)$notes;
00227         $data['author_main'] = $main_author;
00228         $data['authors_add'] = $authors;
00229         $data['authors_corp'] = $corp_authors;
00230         $data['authors_conf'] = $conf_authors;
00231         $data['subjects'] = $topics;
00232         $data['copies'] = $copies;
00233 
00234         $_records[] = $data;
00235         $record_num++;
00236     }
00237     return $_records;
00238 }
00239 ?>
